summary: AI Image Generator app with one-click interface, auto-enhanced prompts, coin-based generation system (50 free coins, 10 per image), loading animations, image display with download, recharge messaging, Internet Identity authentication, and external API integration for image generation
architectural_notes: Backend: Motoko for coin tracking and user management
Frontend: React + TypeScript with Tailwind CSS
API calls made from frontend TypeScript code
External AI image generation service integration (API endpoint and credentials to be added post-deployment)
Users authenticated via Internet Identity system
Coin-based economy: 50 free starting coins, 10 coins per image generation
known_issues: External API credentials (endpoint and authentication key) must be added after deployment for actual image generation

existing_features.title: Add a new AIImageGeneratorScreen component with a single-input interface consisting of one text input box with placeholder 'Enter your idea...' and a 'Generate Image' button

Implement auto-enhanced prompt system that automatically appends professional settings to user input before generation: 'Ultra high quality, 4K, professional, detailed, cinematic lighting, sharp focus, masterpiece'
Implement coin-based generation system where each image generation costs 10 coins, with validation to prevent generation when user has insufficient balance
Display loading animation with appropriate messaging while image generation is in progress
Display generated image in the interface with a download button that triggers browser download of the image file
Display 'Please recharge to generate more images' message when user's coin balance reaches 0 coins
Structure frontend code to call external AI image generation API with user's enhanced prompt, configurable to accept API endpoint URL and authentication credentials as constants
Ensure AI Image Generator screen is fully responsive and mobile-friendly with clean, minimal design aesthetic consistent with existing app styling
Integrate AI Image Generator with existing Internet Identity authentication system to ensure only authenticated users can access generation features
Add navigation route and menu item for AI Image Generator screen in the authenticated layout

new_feature_requests.summary: Simple one-click AI image generator interface with single input box and Generate Image button
Auto-enhanced prompt system that adds professional settings (4K, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed, sharp focus, masterpiece)
Coin system: users start with 50 free coins, 10 coins deducted per image generation
Image display with download button functionality
Recharge message display when user reaches 0 coins

Initialize new users with 50 free coins in their account when they first authenticate via Internet Identity
